clinical_study.brief_title: Assessing the Safety and Performance of the easyEndoTM Universal Linear Cutting Stapler in Laparoscopic Gastric Bypass Surgery
clinical_study.official_title: Assessing the Safety and Performance of the easyEndoTM Universal Linear Cutting Stapler in Laparoscopic Gastric Bypass Surgery: a Monocentric Post-market Observational Study

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this observational registry is to evaluate the safety and performance of the easyEndoTM Universal Linear Cutting Stapler and reloads from Ezisurg Medical used in laparoscopic RYGB surgery to create anastomoses. The goal of the study will be achieved by assessing the device performance and reporting of peri- and postoperative complications in a prospectively maintained database.

primary_outcome.measure: To evaluate the safety of the easyEndoTM Universal Linear Cutting Stapler and reloads (Ezisurg Medical)
primary_outcome.description: Number of participants with peri-operative anastomotic leaks and intraluminal/intraperitoneal bleeding.

primary_outcome.measure: To evaluate the safety of the easyEndoTM Universal Linear Cutting Stapler and reloads (Ezisurg Medical)
primary_outcome.description: Number of participants with post-operative anastomotic leaks and intraluminal/intraperitoneal bleeding.

primary_outcome.measure: To evaluate the safety of the easyEndoTM Universal Linear Cutting Stapler and reloads (Ezisurg Medical)
primary_outcome.description: Number of participants with post-operative anastomotic leaks and intraluminal/intraperitoneal bleeding.

primary_outcome.measure: To evaluate the safety of the easyEndoTM Universal Linear Cutting Stapler and reloads (Ezisurg Medical)
primary_outcome.description: Number of participants with post-operative anastomotic leaks and intraluminal/intraperitoneal bleeding.

primary_outcome.measure: To evaluate the safety of the easyEndoTM Universal Linear Cutting Stapler and reloads (Ezisurg Medical)
primary_outcome.description: Number of participants with postoperative anastomotic leaks and intraluminal/intraperitoneal bleeding.

secondary_outcome.measure: To evaluate the performance of the easyEndoTM Universal Linear Cutting Stapler and reloads (Ezisurg Medical)
secondary_outcome.description: Number of procedures with technical success, defined as laparoscopic Roux-en-Y gastric bypass formation as intended without technical difficulties and without conversion to open laparotomy.

secondary_outcome.measure: To evaluate the performance of the easyEndoTM Universal Linear Cutting
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment of device performance (e.g. sharpness of the blade, staple-line formation, etc.).

secondary_outcome.measure: To evaluate the efficacy of the laparoscopic RYGB surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Number of participants with peri-operative complications such as but not limited to: peritonitis, anastomotic stenosis/stricture, internal hernia, small bowel obstruction, ulceration, fistula formation, ventral hernia, iatrogenic splenic injury, wound infection, pneumonia, pulmonary embolism, kidney failure, gallstones, arrhythmia, stroke, infarction, death.

secondary_outcome.measure: To evaluate the efficacy of the laparoscopic RYGB surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Number of participants with post-operative complications such as but not limited to: peritonitis, anastomotic stenosis/stricture, internal hernia, small bowel obstruction, ulceration, fistula formation, ventral hernia, iatrogenic splenic injury, wound infection, pneumonia, pulmonary embolism, kidney failure, gallstones, arrhythmia, stroke, infarction, death.

secondary_outcome.measure: To evaluate the efficacy of the laparoscopic RYGB surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Number of participants with post-operative complications such as but not limited to: peritonitis, anastomotic stenosis/stricture, internal hernia, small bowel obstruction, ulceration, fistula formation, ventral hernia, iatrogenic splenic injury, wound infection, pneumonia, pulmonary embolism, kidney failure, gallstones, arrhythmia, stroke, infarction, death.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Obese patients eligible for laparoscopic RYGB surgery.

intervention.intervention_name: easyEndoTM Universal Linear Cutting Stapler and reloads (Ezisurg Medical)
intervention.description: Device for creation of anastomoses during laparoscopic RYGB surgery manufactured by Ezisurg Medical.
intervention.arm_group_label: Obese patients eligible for laparoscopic RYGB surgery.

study_pop.textblock: Obese patients eligible for laparoscopic RYGB surgery. This registry will collect data from 150 laparoscopic RYGB procedures in which anastomoses are created with the easyEndoTM Universal Linear Cutting Stapler and reloads (Ezisurg Medical).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Age at study entry is at least 18 years.
2. Patient must sign and date the informed consent form prior to the index-procedure. If the patient is not able to give informed consent, a legally authorized representative must give informed consent on his/her behalf.
3. Patient has a BMI ≥ 35 kg/m2 with one of more related co-morbidities.
4. Patient has a BMI ≥ 40 kg/m2.
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Patient is pregnant.
2. History of bariatric surgery.
3. Patient is known to be, or suspected of being unable to comply with the study protocol or proposed follow-up visits (e.g. no permanent address, known to be non-compliant or presenting an unstable psychiatric history).
